text: We were referred to Dr. Melanie Tan by my mum’s renal doctor, Dr. Ng, and had a fantastic experience. The receptionist was welcoming and made us feel reassured from the moment we arrived. The nurse was also very friendly and showed great understanding of my mum's condition. Dr. Tan kindly accommodated us for a last-minute consultation, and we never felt rushed. She took the time to explain everything clearly, and we finally understood why my mum was experiencing her condition. Highly recommend Dr. Tan and her amazing team for their excellent care and service!

I  like to express my heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Melanie Tan for the exceptional care she provided to my mum during her recent checkup. From the very beginning, she was incredibly patient, kind, and attentive, making sure my mum felt comfortable and heard throughout the process.

Dr. Melanie Tan conducted a very thorough and detailed examination, leaving no stone unturned. She took the time to explain everything clearly, ensuring we understood every aspect of my mum’s health. Her gentle approach and professionalism truly stood out, and it was evident that she genuinely cares for her patients.

Finding a doctor who listens to elderly with such patience and empathy is rare, and we feel extremely fortunate to have met her. I highly recommend Dr. Melanie Tan to anyone looking for a dedicated and compassionate healthcare professional. Thank you for your outstanding service!
